attributes.action: Review social fund borrowing limits so couples are not penalised
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present a single person can have a total of £1500 in social fund borrowing (borrowing for crisis and budgeting loans). Two single people can therefore have a total of £3000. Yet a couple can only have a total of £1500 in social fund borrowing. This is grossly unfair.

We petition the prime minister to reform social fund rules and bring borrowing limits for a couple to a more reasonable level comparable to that for two single people
